home.title: Faxi - Connecting Fax to the Internet
home.description: Bridging the digital divide with AI-powered fax technology

families.headline: Connect Your Parents' Fax Machine to the Internet
families.subheadline: Help elderly parents access online services without learning computers. Book appointments, shop online, and pay bills—all through the fax machine they already know.

partners.headline: Reach 10 Million Elderly Customers Through Fax
partners.subheadline: Access the untapped elderly market in Japan. Increase service accessibility and gain valuable consumer insights through our AI-powered fax bridge.

investors.headline: Resurrecting Fax Technology with AI
investors.subheadline: The last untapped consumer market in Japan. 10M elderly users with fax machines, no internet. Proven AI technology with 90%+ accuracy.

problem.title: The Digital Divide in Japan
problem.description: Millions of elderly Japanese citizens are left behind as society moves online. They have fax machines but no internet access, cutting them off from essential services.

noDigitalFootprint.label: Seniors with no digital footprint
noDigitalFootprint.source: Estimated from MIC Internet Usage Survey

solution.title: AI-Powered Fax Bridge
solution.description: Faxi uses advanced AI to interpret handwritten faxes and connect them to modern internet services. No computer skills required—just send a fax like always.

aiVision.title: Advanced AI Vision
aiVision.description: 90%+ accuracy in handwriting recognition and intent detection

accessibility.title: Service Accessibility Gap
accessibility.description: Comparison of service access rates between internet users and non-users

insights.title: Key Insights
insights.point1: Internet usage drops dramatically after age 75, with only 25% of those 80+ using the internet regularly
insights.point2: 10 million elderly Japanese still rely on fax machines as their primary communication method
insights.point3: Service accessibility drops by 50-60% for those without internet access across all categories
insights.point4: Faxi bridges this gap by connecting fax machines to modern internet services, making digital services accessible to all

service.title: Service for Families
service.subtitle: How Faxi helps your elderly family members access modern services

overview.title: How Faxi Works
overview.subtitle: Simple steps to connect your fax machine to the internet

register.title: 1. Register Your Fax Number
register.description: Sign up online and register your fax machine number. We'll assign you a unique service number.

send.title: 2. Send a Fax
send.description: Write your request on paper and send it to our service number. Use checkmarks, circles, or simple handwriting.

process.title: 3. AI Processes Your Request
process.description: Our AI reads your fax, understands your intent, and connects to the appropriate service.

receive.title: 4. Receive Confirmation
receive.description: Get a confirmation fax back with details of your completed request.

overview.exampleDescription: Here are some examples of how to format your faxes for different services

useCases.title: What You Can Do with Faxi
useCases.subtitle: Real-world examples of how Faxi helps with daily tasks

healthcare.title: Book Doctor Appointments
healthcare.problem: Calling clinics during business hours is difficult, and online booking systems are confusing
healthcare.solution: Send a fax anytime to book, reschedule, or cancel appointments. Receive confirmation by fax.

shopping.title: Shop Online Without Internet
shopping.problem: Cannot access e-commerce websites or mobile apps
shopping.solution: Browse product catalogs by fax, select items with checkmarks, and place orders. Payment via registered card or cash on delivery.

government.title: Access Government Services
government.problem: Government offices are far away and online portals are difficult to navigate
government.solution: Submit forms, request documents, and check application status via fax.

payment.title: Pay Bills Easily
payment.problem: Online banking is confusing and ATMs are inconvenient
payment.solution: Receive bills by fax, mark payment amount, and send back. Automatic payment from registered account.

aiChat.title: Chat with AI Assistant
aiChat.problem: Need information, companionship, or help with questions
aiChat.solution: Write questions on paper and fax them. Receive detailed answers and helpful information by fax.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about using Faxi

cost.question: How much does Faxi cost?
cost.answer: Basic service is ¥980/month including unlimited fax processing. Premium features like priority processing and advanced services are ¥1,980/month.

setup.question: Is it difficult to set up?
setup.answer: No setup required on your fax machine. Simply register online with your fax number and start sending faxes to our service number.

accuracy.question: How accurate is the handwriting recognition?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves over 90% accuracy on handwritten text. If the AI is unsure, we'll send a clarification fax asking for confirmation.

security.question: Is my information secure?
security.answer: Yes. All faxes are encrypted during transmission and processing. We comply with Japanese privacy laws and never share your data without permission.

support.question: What if I need help?
support.answer: We offer phone support in Japanese during business hours (9am-6pm). You can also send a fax with your question and we'll respond by fax.

services.question: What services are supported?
services.answer: Currently we support healthcare appointments, online shopping, government services, bill payments, and AI chat. We're constantly adding new services based on user needs.

faq.contactDescription: Contact us by phone or fax
